PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-07092008-04-11INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of ROD A. TAYLOR of Whitehorse, Yukon, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
